languages.text: A successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this weapon inflicts the {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (12) effect on the target and the attacker. The attacker must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to negate this effect.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Попадание{/g} этим оружием накладывает эффект {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g} (12) и на цель, и на атакующего. Атакующий может избежать эффекта. Для этого он должен пройти проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −20.

traits.locale_text: A successful hit with this weapon inflicts the {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} on the target and the attacker, dealing 12 damage per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. The attacker must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −20 penalty to negate this effect.

A successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this weapon inflicts the {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (12) effect on the target and the attacker. The attacker must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to negate this effect.

A successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this weapon inflicts the {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (12) effect on the target and the attacker. The attacker must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to negate this effect.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Попадание{/g} этим оружием накладывает эффект {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g} (12) и на цель, и на атакующего. Атакующий может избежать эффекта. Для этого он должен пройти проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −20.
languages.original_text: A successful hit with this weapon inflicts the {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} on the target and the attacker, dealing 12 damage per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. The attacker must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −20 penalty to negate this effect.

traits.locale_text: Попадание этим оружием накладывает {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}эффект{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g} (12) и на цель, и на атакующего. Атакующий может избежать эффекта. Для этого он должен пройти проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:Test}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −20.

Попадание этим оружием накладывает {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}эффект{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g} (12) и на цель, и на атакующего. Атакующий может избежать эффекта. Для этого он должен пройти проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:Test}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −20.

languages.text: 使用此武器{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}目标时，会对目标与攻击者本人造成{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}（12）效果。攻击者需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此检定中承受-20{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。只有通过检定才能抵消对自己的燃烧效果。
languages.original_text: A successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this weapon inflicts the {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (12) effect on the target and the attacker. The attacker must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to negate this effect.

traits.locale_text: 使用此武器{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}目标时，会对目标与攻击者本人造成{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}，每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}造成12点伤害。攻击者需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，且在此检定中承受-20{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。只有通过检定才能抵消对自己的燃烧效果。

languages.text: この武器が{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}すると、ターゲットと攻撃者に{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}効果が付与され、ターンごとに12ダメージを与える。この効果を無効化するには、攻撃者は、−20の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に合格しなければならない。
languages.original_text: A successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this weapon inflicts the {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (12) effect on the target and the attacker. The attacker must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to negate this effect.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}すると、ターゲットと攻撃者に{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}が付与され、{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}ごとに12ダメージを与える。この効果を無効化するには、攻撃者は、{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}が20の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判断{/g}に合格しなければならない。

languages.text: Al acertar un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g} con esta arma, tanto el objetivo como el atacante sufren el efecto {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} (12). El atacante debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −20 para negar este efecto.
languages.original_text: A successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this weapon inflicts the {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (12) effect on the target and the attacker. The attacker must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to negate this effect.

traits.locale_text: Al acertar un {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacto{/g} con esta arma, tanto el objetivo como el atacante sufren el {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g}, que causa 12 de daño por {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. El atacante debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de fortaleza de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −20 para negar este efecto.

languages.text: Ein {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g} mit dieser Waffe fügt dem Ziel und dem Angreifer selbst den Effekt {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g} (12) zu. Der Angreifer muss eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −20 bestehen, um diesen Effekt aufzuheben.
languages.original_text: A successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this weapon inflicts the {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (12) effect on the target and the attacker. The attacker must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to negate this effect.

traits.locale_text: Ein {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}Treffer{/g} mit dieser Waffe fügt dem Ziel und dem Angreifer selbst den {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennung{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} zu. Pro {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} werden so 12 Schaden zugefügt. Der Angreifer muss eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Widerstandsprobe{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −20 bestehen, um diesen Effekt zu negieren.

languages.text: Un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coup{/g} porté avec cette arme applique l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} (12) à la cible et l'attaquant. L'attaquant doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −20 pour annuler cet effet.
languages.original_text: A successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this weapon inflicts the {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (12) effect on the target and the attacker. The attacker must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to negate this effect.

traits.locale_text: Un {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}coup{/g} porté à l'aide de cette arme applique l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} sur la cible et l'attaquant en infligeant 12 points de dégâts par {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. L'attaquant doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de résistance lié à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de -20 pour annuler cet effet.
